name: ApplicationService
description: an application service composed by a set of individual logical service nodes (ServiceInstances)

applicationId.description: application id, which constrains the type of manifests that can be installed on this ApplicationService

architecture.description: application architecture, e.g. v3, r1 or ebox

archtier.description: define proper architecture for alerting and repaire process

nugget.description: short name to unique identify an application

tier.description: indicate DR level, refer to DR playbook

serviceInstances.description: list of individual ServiceInstance nodes that compose this application

updateStrategies.description: update strategies that operations can apply to this application service

defaultUpdateStrategy.description: default update strategy for operations to apply to this application service

activeManifestRef.description: software manifest that should be active on all nodes in this ApplicationService

activeManifestHistory.description: history of activated manifests on this ApplicationService

installedManifestsRef.description: list of manifests that should be installed on this service node

resourceClusters.description: list of VClusters that make up this ApplicationService

escalation.description: the escalations this resource associated with

accessPoints.description: accesspoint exposed by this application, typically one, but possible to have many

environment.description: the environment this Resource belongs to
